name: TvLand
description:
game link - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/810732807/

(sorry for the long loading of the game, the game is pretty big for a scratch game so bear with me ;-;)

created in scratch

models made by msimunek

sounds, menu/ingame music made by msimunek

ending cutscene music - heart to heart, Mac DeMarco

You wake up in an unknown place. You see your favorite childhood mascot animatronics. They make you play a game of surviving. By winning you get to save your son, but can you survive? Can you manage to get through hell of hiding to save your child?

                                                                            WARNING

                            This is a horror games, that includes flashing lights, jumpscares and loud noises. Play at your own risk!

                                                                          CONTROLS

Dipsy - Dipsy will play a looped song. remember the speed and pitch of the song, so incase it changes, you press A to reset it.

Lala - Lala will crawl through the hall in front of you. (press W to shine your flashlight at the hall) Incase you see her, press SPACE to put on your mask.  MAKE SURE TO NOT DIE DUE TO LACK OF OXYGEN.

Po - Po will walk to the hall on the right. If you hear her walking, press D to shock her to scare her away.

Tinky Winky - Tinky Winky will run in the hall on the right. If you hear him running, DON'T shock him. Just let him pass through, he's a friendly fella ;).
